name: reumlab-seo
description: REUMLAB SEO 키워드 랜딩 자동생성 시스템

scripts.build: npm run prebuild && node scripts/prepare-next-public.mjs && next build
scripts.build:legacy: npm run prebuild && npm run build:hubs && npm run build:landings && npm run copy:main && npm run gen:sitemaps && npm run gen:robots
